name: Home_Seek
description:
How to Play:

Arrow Keys - Move (Left, Right, Up, Down)

Space - Pick up/Get rid of shell

-------

This game is made  by myself for Global Game Jam 2019 in about 10hrs.

I am so in love with games like "Loneliness," which has little gameplay but rich in meaning.

Maybe I didn't do well this time, but I have no plan to keep update this project because I want to follow the spirit of game jam, that is, there is no "unfinished" games, haha!

I will keep going to create games like this, this is what I am pursuing for.
